text: Is it possible to restrict certain pages to certain users (based on permissions?). For context, we want 3 separate login pages - or login groups (Members, Vendors, Admin).
Yes, you would use 3 separate lists to control this.
<@U7SL518D6> Hmm okay, thank you! Is there any documentation for this, or could you elaborate a little? (Sorry! I'm new to the membership thing.)

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cms-pages-editor/control-audience-access-to-pages>

Our membership system is directly tied to the CRM. So you use Contact Lists to manage who can see a page.

In your case youâ€™d want 3 contact lists, one for admins, vendors and members. Depending on your real needs, if your Admins would be people who would have access to edit website pages inside of HubSpot, then you can possibly drop the need for the separate admin list.

You can then conditionally show information as well as allow access to specific pages based on list.
